title: Convergence at Darujhistan
description: The Malazan Empire's attempt to conquer the Free City of Darujhistan leads to a massive convergence of powers, involving the Tiste Andii, the Bridgeburners, and various ascendants.

title: The Whirlwind Rebellion Begins
description: The apocalyptic uprising begins in Seven Cities as Sha'ik proclaims the Whirlwind, leading to widespread rebellion against Malazan rule.

title: The Chain of Dogs
description: Coltaine's legendary march to save 50,000 refugees across the hostile Seven Cities subcontinent, culminating in the Fall of Coltaine at Aren.

title: The Pannion War Begins
description: The Malazan forces ally with former enemies to combat the cannibalistic Pannion Domin that threatens to consume all of Genabackis.

title: The Siege of Capustan
description: The Grey Swords defend the holy city of Capustan against the Pannion Domin's cannibalistic hordes in a desperate siege.

title: Convergence at Coral
description: The final battle against the Pannion Domin at Coral sees the death of Whiskeyjack and the revelation of the Crippled God's influence.

title: Convergence at Raraku
description: The Whirlwind Rebellion reaches its climax at the holy desert of Raraku, where the 14th Army faces Sha'ik Reborn in a decisive battle.

title: Tiste Edur Conquest of Lether
description: The Tiste Edur, led by Emperor Rhulad Sengar, conquer the merchant empire of Lether, fundamentally changing both civilizations.

title: The Bonehunters' Last Stand
description: The 14th Army, now called the Bonehunters, faces betrayal and attempts to destroy them at the very heart of the Malazan Empire.

title: The Liberation of Lether
description: The Bonehunters arrive in Lether to face the mad Emperor Rhulad Sengar, while Tehol Beddict's economic revolution transforms the empire.

title: The Hounds of Shadow Unleashed
description: Ancient powers converge on Darujhistan as the Hounds of Shadow are unleashed, leading to the final fate of Anomander Rake.

title: March into the Wastelands
description: The Bonehunters begin their seemingly impossible march into the eastern wastelands, pursuing a destiny only Tavore understands.

title: The K'Chain Che'Malle Awakening
description: The ancient K'Chain Che'Malle stir from their long slumber, seeking to reclaim their place in the world under the guidance of their new Destriant.

title: The Crippled God's Liberation
description: The final convergence at the Spire of Kolanse determines the fate of the Crippled God and the destiny of the Malazan Empire.

title: Rise of Kellanved and Dancer
description: The future Emperor Kellanved and his companion Dancer begin their rise to power on the small island of Malaz.

title: The Tragedy of Mock's Hold
description: The night that changed everything, as witnessed by the young Kiska and the veteran Temper, marking the transformation of Kellanved and Dancer.

title: The Crimson Guard's Vow
description: The mercenary company known as the Crimson Guard takes their legendary Vow, binding them in eternal opposition to the Malazan Empire.

title: The Genabackis Campaign Begins
description: The Malazan Empire launches its ambitious campaign to conquer the continent of Genabackis, beginning decades of warfare.

title: The Siege of Pale
description: The disastrous siege where Anomander Rake and Moon's Spawn devastate the Malazan forces, leading to the near-destruction of the Bridgeburners.

title: The Last Stand at Aren
description: The tragic end of Coltaine's Chain of Dogs, where the Wickan Warleader and his forces make their final stand against overwhelming odds.
